resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103880</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103880</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205930</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Southern Mosaic: The John and Ruby Lomax 1939 Southern States Recording Trip</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Südliches Mosaik: Der John und der Rubin 
Lomax 1939 südliche Zustände, die Reise speichern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mosaïque Méridionale : John et le rubis 
Lomax 1939 états méridionaux enregistrant le voyage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mosaic Do sul: O John e o ruby Lomax 1939 
estados do sul que gravam o desengate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mosaico Del sud: Il John ed il rubino Lomax 
1939 del sud Dichiara il viaggio della registrazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Νότιο μωσαϊκό: Ο John και τα ροδοκόκκινα 
νότια κράτη Lomax 1939 που καταγράφουν το ταξίδι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mosaico Meridional: El Juan y el rubí Lomax
1939 estados meridionales que registran viaje</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is a field collection of 700 sound recordings, field notes, dust jackets, and other manuscripts documenting a three-month, 6,502-mile trip through the southern U.S. The recordings include ballads, blues, children's songs, cowboy songs, fiddle tunes, field hollers, lullabies, play-party songs, religious dramas, spirituals, and work songs.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist eine auffangenansammlung von 700 
Tonaufnahmen, fängt Anmerkungen, Staubjacken und andere 
Manuskripte, die ein dreimonatiges, Reise 6,502-mile durch die 
südlichen US dokumentieren auf. Die Aufnahmen schließen 
Balladen, Blau, Liede der Kinder, Cowboyliede, Geige Melodien ein, 
fangen brüllt, Lullabies, play-Partei Liede, fromme 
Dramen, Angelegenheiten und Arbeit Liede auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est une collection de zone de 700 enregistrements 
sonores, de notes de zone, de vestes de la poussière, et d'autres 
manuscrits documentant un de trois mois, le voyage 6,502-mile par les 
États-Unis méridionaux. Les enregistrements incluent des 
ballades, bleus, les chansons des enfants, chansons de cowboy, airs de
violon, zone crie, des berceuses, des chansons de jeu-partie, des 
drames religieux, chant religieux, et des chansons de travail.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é uma coleção do campo de 700 gravações 
sadias, de notas do campo, de revestimentos da poeira, e de outros 
manuscritos que documentam um three-month, desengate 6,502-mile 
através dos E. U. do sul. As gravações incluem ballads, 
azuis, canções das crianças, canções do vaqueiro, tunes do 
fiddle, campo hollers, lullabies, canções do jogo-partido, dramas 
religiosos, espiritual, e canções do trabalho.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è una collezione del campo di 700 registrazioni 
del suono, di note del campo, di rivestimenti della polvere e di altri
manoscritti che documentano un di tre mesi, il viaggio 6,502-mile 
attraverso gli Stati Uniti del sud. Le registrazioni includono i
ballads, gli azzurri, le canzoni dei bambini, le canzoni del cowboy, 
le arie del fiddle, campo hollers, lullabies, canzoni del 
gioco-partito, drammi religiosi, spiritual e canzoni del lavoro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι μια συλλογή πεδίων 700 υγιών καταγραφών, των
σημειώσεων πεδίων, των σακακιών σκόνης, και άλλων χειρογράφων 
τεκμηριώνοντας ένα τρίμηνο, ταξίδι 6.502-μιλίου μέσω των νότιων
ΗΠΑ Οι καταγραφές περιλαμβάνουν τις μπαλάντες, μπλε, 
τραγούδια των παιδιών, τραγούδια κάουμποϋ, το βιολί συντονίζει,
hollers πεδίων, νανουρίσματα, τραγούδια παιχνίδι-συμβαλλόμενων
μερών, θρησκευτικά δράματα, spirituals, και τραγούδια 
εργασίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es una colección del campo de 700 grabaciones de 
sonidos, de notas del campo, de chaquetas del polvo, y de otros 
manuscritos que documentan un de tres meses, viaje 6,502-mile a 
través de los E.E.U.U. meridionales. Las grabaciones incluyen 
las baladas, azul, canciones de los niños, canciones del vaquero, 
consonancias del violín, campo hollers, los arrullos, las canciones 
del juego-partido, los dramas religiosos, espiritual, y las canciones 
del trabajo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205930</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103880</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/southern-mosaic-the-john-and-ruby-lomax-1939-southern-states-recording-trip</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
